title: Station master
creator_credit: ONF | NFB, Nicholas Balla and William Davidson
brief_description: Finch, Ontario, is where the Canadian Pacific railway crosses the New York Central, a tiny but important link in Canada’s railway network. This film looks at the daily duties of station master Dalton Henry and his staff.
creator_credit_for_label: ONF | NFB, Nicholas Balla and William Davidson
